code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Idle
    Idle --> Connecting: connect()
    Connecting --> Connected: connection_ok()
    Connecting --> Error: connection_error()
    Connected --> Authenticated: authenticate()
    Connected --> Error: auth_timeout()
    Authenticated --> Ready: init_complete()
    Authenticated --> Error: init_error()
    Ready --> Idle: disconnect()
    Error --> Idle: reset()
    Ready --> Transmitting: send_data()
    Transmitting --> Ready: transmission_complete()
    Transmitting --> Error: transmission_error()
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
